title: Vox Machina Ep. 23 - The Rematch
description: As Vox Machina prepares for their return to Emon, Grog demands a rematch against Kern to regain his honor, but the real battle is what occurs in the audience. Upon returning home, the group has an awkward encounter with a fan, but there’s no time to rest with bad news on the horizon…
content:encoded: As Vox Machina prepares for their return to Emon, Grog demands a rematch against Kern to regain his honor, but the real battle is what occurs in the audience. Upon returning home, the group has an awkward encounter with a fan, but there’s no time to rest with bad news on the horizon…
